comments.body:
> Under what scenario would this metrics be useful?

This a supplyment for uncompleted work of "droppedEventsCounter" (in LiveListenerBus). 
This metrics could let us know the running condition of bus  at the level of LiveListenerBus, rather than multiple AsyncEventQueue separately only.
